description:
Designed to add the perfect dose of core warmth to any active pursuit, the RealFleece™ High Pile Vest is a slim-fit fleece vest that harnesses the natural benefits of merino wool. This cosy and comfortable vest features Icebreaker's RealFleece™ fabric that's soft, breathable and naturally odour resistant. Elastic binding at the arm holes makes for a secure fit, while offset, flatlock stitching helps reduce friction. Zippered hand pockets secure your daily essentials.

Superfine merino fibres are brushed to create Icebreaker RealFleece™, a natural fleece that warms and breathes next to your skin. Inspired by nature, Icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker RealFleece High Pile Vest - Mens
